adHeader: PACK & UNPACK SERVICE...for your home or office move!
adDetails: Need assistance getting everything boxed up for your move? Leave it to the professionals, GREG'S PACKING SERVICE. Instead of taking you a frustrating week, we'll have it all done in one day! We'll arrive with PACKING TECHNOLOGY: Cell kits, dish packs, corrugate, cellophanes, tapes, etc. Each room's box is color marked and contents labeled. MOVING WILL BE A BREEZE! Unloading and placement will be a breeze. You won't be saying. "Where did I put that???" If you desire help unpacking at the other end, (near or far away), we can do that too. We can also HAUL AWAY your post move debris, furniture, dump, donations, etc...AND! We can also coordinate your shipping and receiving logistics internationally! Call Greg today show contact info and leave the work to us! References available. Mover, Moving, Movers, Relocators, Relocation, Hauling, Logistics, Packers, Packing, Storage, Dumping, Donating,Trucking.
